name: Pranav Nigam

projects.title: Walmart Hiring Portal - Store/Supply Chain Jobs
projects.description: A portal to help you find and apply jobs at Walmart.

aboutpara:
I am a dedicated and experienced Software Engineer with over 4.5+ years of full-stack development expertise. Currently working at Walmart, I have contributed to designing and implementing event-driven architectures, optimising cloud infrastructure, and improving hiring efficiency through automation. 

My experience includes working with Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, Azure Sql, Azure Cosmos Database (NoSQL), React, Angular. 

I am passionate about system design, API development, and creating scalable software solutions that enhance user experience and efficiency.
